info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to an IOTV vest <info>at the shoulder</info>, for additional protection
restriction: Item must be an IOTV deltoid protector

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to an IOTV vest <info>in front of the belt</info>, for additional protection of the groin
restriction: Item must be an IOTV groin protector

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to an IOTV vest <info>at the neck</info>, for additional protection
restriction: Item must be an IOTV neck or nape protector

info: This item can be <good>attached</good> to an IOTV vest <info>at lower back</info>, for additional protection
restriction: Item must be an IOTV lower back protector
